reviews.text: If I could leave zero stars and write a review I would . PLEASE DO NOT MOVE HERE! THIS IS A WARNING! Dont let the looks fool you it's overly priced to say we are right next to the hood! We've had 2 deaths on the property a month apart. The gates are always broke and the owner dont give a damn about you but your rent on time but they aren't on time for you. No maintenance on the property EVER! AND THEY GIVE YOU SORRY EXCUSES FOR IT. MY DRYER HAVE BROKE TWICE SINCE LIVING HERE! THE FIRST TIME IT WAS BROKE FOR 4 MONTHS THEY PUT ANOTHER USED ONE IN ONLY TO BREAK AGAIN 2 MONTHS AFTER THAT NOBODY HAVE CAME SEEN ABOUT THE DRYER YET AND NOW ITS GOING ON 3 MONTHE SINCE IT BROKE I DONT EVEN CALL AND CHECK ON THE STATUS CUZ NOBODY IN THR OFFICE KNOWS ANYTHING THIS IS THE WORST PLACE TO LIVE PLEASE DONT BE ANXIOUS TO MOVE HERE BECUASE OF THE LOOKS CUZ LOOKS WILL HAVE YOU FOOLED!!!! AHHHHHHHH

don't know what to tell you about this place other than the fact that I've never been there don't know why it puts up like I was there or not but I wasn't so I'm just going to Babylon and try to get some points off the bill anyway don't even know what the points of for don't even know why you need points what you get out of it but that's why I'm babbling so you might want to stop reading now because there's nothing that I'm about to say that anybody cares about
A Okay Charles Towns
Nice apartment inside beautiful but the kind of people that lived there horrible section 8....
If the health department did inspection for that place they will cancel the license because of the very bad smell.
Well made food, good atmosphere, great waiters.

Very nice, cosy restaurant.
The food was tasty and the waitress was very helpful.
Taste of overcooked meat and overpriced wine, unpleasent staff also. asked for the house wine, but was offered a netto wine "35 kr in supermarket but they asked 260kr." i mean come on....

A bit cramped space-wise.
Food was good, though.

Dinner party was superb, please keep reading. Celebrating my birthday i had 29 people coming for what was an unforgettable night. From the start Dario was very helpsome in putting together the menu and answer all questions ensuring me that the party was in good hands. From we arrived the the waiters took good care of us, byo wine delivered the day prior, was served. Food was cooked to order, for each guest and exceptionally good, all three courses (5 different options) It was hard to imagine how they could turn it out so consistent and at the same time. After the dinner they let us stay and dance until 3am. All my guests raved about the food and the party, no exceptions. Alexander

A place in town with beef ribs! For someone who doesn't eat pork, this was very exciting! The rack was dry-rubbed and quite juicy! The sides were very well seasoned. 
The dolmathes were wonderful! One of my favorites. Tangy, creamy, perfect. 
Then, the baklava cheesecake. 
What a wonderful date night.

I was in there Saturday Feb. 17 with my wife for a nice sit down meal. The atmosphere was exquisite, the food was amazing, and our server was off the charts. This is definitely a must visit. However as I was enjoying my meal with my wife, there was a gentleman at another table complaining about cold food, and creating a large scene over it, and clearly becoming irate. I was very impressed with how well the staff and servers handled the gentleman, and the situation that arose. I will say it again, if you enjoy home made Italian and Greek cuisine, Santa Lucia's is the place to go.

I highly recommend dining at the Santa Lucia. The food was fantastic. The waitress was very charming and friendly. She did a fantastic job. The food is not overpriced. The chef even asked us if we enjoyed the food. That is always a good sign when the chef is interested in the experience of his customers. It is no wonder that an acquaintance from work insisted that I go here to dine with my wife.

Held a grooms dinner for our sons wedding. Maria the owner was very professional and helped us make a great meal choice. Price was great and the food was fabulous!!!
Highly recommend!!!!
Amazing place! It's like a hidden gem. The food is always delicious and the staff are friendly!

Visited this place as a group of 3 children and 2 adults. I would say good service overall, and amazing burger. We also ordered a steak and mussels and 2 more items which I cannot remember. The management could have been more polite. Even though we needed a table for an hour only, the man who appeared to be the head waiter was difficult and unfriendly over it. Eventually we were sat at a good table by the lovely waitress, quickly ate and left with our children. So he needn't stress about vacating our table for guests who would probably not arrive for another hour or so.

The place seemed promising due to reviews and the great deco inside. Our dining experience was a little disappointing; staff didn't seem very friendly nor welcoming (we did not have a reservation). The waiter at our table was plain rude, abrupt. For instance, my plate was burning hot but I was not told to be careful. I speak French, so the language barrier is no issue. He did not explain how to work the gas dish-warmer that came with the vegetarian dish and he did not care when I mentioned there were bits of cork in my red wine. Luckily, another kind waiter saw us trying to figure things out and he helped. I had the grilled veal (I had better, I had worse). Burger was really good, I tried a bit. All in all, a decent meal but we wouldn't go back.

Lovely.  A bit too busy and all the tables are squashed next to each other. (we really didn't appreciate that)  That is a shame as even the waiter had a tough time serving and clearing. We had to help him. The food however was extraordinary. The service staff exceptional.  Maybe try the terrace it looks more spacious.

The food is good and the service too but in summer you can easily sit on the bird excrement and become dirty while restaurant do not care. Also plant of flies in summer as we ordered a big plate to share and literally they were sitting at every peace of it and flying all around us, while restaurant again do not care and did not propose us any discount or apologized...

Typical French cuisine with wide choice of dishes and wines from different parts of France, with special focus on oysters and it delivers! It’s a bit squeezed in terms of space, but it doesn’t bother. The biggest minus is the service - not very friendly, and much too slow, especially for a place that sells upscale brassiere experience. The prices are on the expensive side

This is nice American dinner. It offers your typical comfort food, served fast and with typical Southerner friendliness. Portions are good, prices are fair and the coffee is always flowing. Breakfast on weekends is very busy, so you may have to wait to get seated. The staff are very welcoming and friendly. Definitively give this place a try if you are in this neighborhood.

Loved the food here! I ordered the chicken tenders with a Belgian Waffle. Sooo good! Very small establishment, therefore, we had to stand in line outside and wait for tables to become available. Waitress was awesome and did not have to wait long for our orders. Will definitely come back and will recommend to family and friends!!

Great Diner. Plenty of good options to try. Its def a hidden gem of midtown. If you are stopping through Atlanta its a place where you should eat. It gets very packed ,but food is good and service is prompt. They help keep it moving so they can accommodate everyone without any party feeling rushed
Used to love the country ham here. Sadly now it's way too salty and tough as leather. However, there are so many good choices I can probably get over it.
Great piece of history. If you haven't been you should definitely check it out. The waitresses are no nonsense but efficient and polite.

We arrived early afternoon and asked to sit inside, there were maybe 2 guests in whole establishment. The waitress told us not possible as reserved tables, we left after food and there were still just 2 guests.
What is also poor is my friends food arrived 15 minutes before mine, she had almost finished eating before my meal arrived. How difficult for even a basic student chef or cook to start for example a steak, which takes twice time as salmon for example so both meals arrive same time. 
So not good experience and do not recommend. 
Shame as food was nice. 
Let down by poor service
It's awesome for party
One of the best lounge bars in Bishkek.
Great cocktails.

Ооо это то самое место где все как и надо. Особая атмосфера.  Вкусные блюда . Суперский кальян . А глинтвейн который я пила мне показался просто шикарным,терпким. Согревающее то что нужно в весеннее и осенние  дни. Если вы не пьющий человек. Самое то. И официанты так ненавязчиво готовы предложить все о чем вы подумали) одно из любимых мест
